item.title: How To Be An Antiracist
item.description: In light of recent events, we’ve switched books from Simon Sinek’s Infinite Game to Ibram X. Kendi’s How To Be An Antiracist. Through our own discussions we realized that we have a lot to learn. The author has been kind enough to create and share some book club resources that you can find on his site. Check out our Book Club page for more info.
